text: Josef Dering was a German painter, sculptor, mosaicist, art educator and commercial artist. He was born in Munich, 1910 and died 1999 in Dakar. For a long time he lived in Eichenau, a municipality in the district of FÃ¼rstenfeldbruck, in Bavaria, Germany. There he designed the village's logo. He also configured an elementary's school facade. To honour of his this school was named after him. ==References== Category:1910 births Category:1999 deaths Category:German painters
title: Josef Dering
